Ocean beach and town amenities just minutes.

geo.directions: Salishan Dr to Aster Ln

remarks: Salishan bay front home! Unique floor plan with lots of light and views of the bay & wildlife! The main level features living room w/vaulted ceilings & fireplace, kitchen with convection oven duel gas & electric range w/ built-in barbecue/pizza oven,/ dining nook with windows overlooking forest. Upper level has the master bedroom suite, custom designed bath with views as you relax in the 6' tub, along with the shower featuring custom artwork by George Johansson. Master also has lighted glass shelves, walk thru closet & deck access. This level also has large artist studio/2nd living area w/ wood stove and large deck. Take the custom bridge over to the studio where there are dual workstations w/ gorgeous bay & forest views! Loft with custom ladder for the young at heart.

Central to Florence & Yachats for dining, shopping, NO neighbors behind!

remarks: Searidge!  Upper ocean view unit.  Sunsets can be viewed from all major living areas.  Features 3 bedrooms, 1 is an upper loft with a half bath.  The main level includes all living areas, master suite, guest bedroom & bath.  Living room features many windows, gas fireplace & a large sliding glass door to a concrete deck.  The unit is handsomely decorated & all major furniture is included in the price. If you are looking for the perfect beach getaway or a full time residence the Searidge community is where you should look; clubhouse, pool & tennis courts. There is a trail through the meadow that leads to the ocean view spa & the easy beach access.  Appointment is necessary.  In the event of multiple offers the seller will review offers on April 11th.  Call your agent today!
